hero.title: Transparency
hero.subtitle: Learn about our commitment to honesty and the current status of our projects

commitment.title: Commitment to Transparency
commitment.description: At Almare Foundation, we believe that trust is built through honesty. Our commitment is to keep the community informed about every step we take, from project planning to the execution of our activities.

currentStatus.title: Current Project Status Explanation
currentStatus.description: We are currently in the process of raising the necessary funds to launch our first emotional support and mental health programs and workshops. Every resource we receive will be used responsibly to fulfill our mission.

projects.title: Programs in Development
projects.description: Our mental health programs are being carefully designed to provide the best possible support to our community.

projectDescriptions.talleresbienestar: Specialized workshops in emotional well-being for different age groups
projectDescriptions.apoyopsicologico: Group psychological support program to strengthen community mental health
projectDescriptions.seminariosconcientizacion: Educational seminars to raise awareness about the importance of mental health
projectDescriptions.almaretea360: Comprehensive support for children and adolescents on the autism spectrum
projectDescriptions.almareeduca: Socioemotional education in schools to promote student well-being
projectDescriptions.almarelaboral: Mental health programs in the workplace to improve work environment
projectDescriptions.almareruralconecta: Bringing psychological support to rural or hard-to-reach areas
projectDescriptions.almareinclusion: Integration of people with disabilities in educational and work spaces
projectDescriptions.almareprimerainfancia: Prevention and promotion of mental health in children aged 0 to 6 years
projectDescriptions.almareadultomayor: Emotional well-being in old age and prevention of loneliness
projectDescriptions.almareresiliencia: Support for people in emotional crisis or after traumatic events
projectDescriptions.almarecomunidadsegura: Prevention of domestic and community violence
